confirmOrModify: Please confirm or modify the following suggested todos:
duplicateError: This todo already exists, please do not add it again.
aiResponseErrorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred while getting the AI response. Please try again later.
askAiAssistant: Ask AI assistant... (Press Shift + Enter for new line, Enter to send)
generateSuggestionsPrompt:
Please generate 5 practical todo suggestions. Requirements: 1. Each suggestion should be a specific executable task 2. Cover different aspects like work, study, health, life 3. Task descriptions should be concise and clear 4. Please return in the following format strictly, one task per line:
1. Task description one
2. Task description two
3. Task description three
4. Task description four
5. Task description five
sortPrompt: Please sort the following todos by priority based on importance and urgency. Consider: 1. Task importance and urgency 2. Task complexity and time required 3. Dependencies between tasks. Please return the sorted numbers in the following format, separated by commas (e.g. 3,1,4,2)
aiSortMismatchError: AI returned sort order does not match the number of todos
aiSortError: AI sorting failed, please try again later.
aiSortParseFailed: Failed to parse AI sorting result, please try again
noActiveTodosError: At least 2 active todos are required for sorting
breakTimeStarted: Break time started. Time to relax!
track3Title: ASMR - 1 Hour Good Sleep Guaranteed with Dummy Head Microphone
confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to clear all conversations? This action cannot be undone.
microphonePermissionDenied: Please allow microphone access to use speech recognition.
browserNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support speech recognition. Please use the latest version of Chrome or Edge.
networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
speechRecognitionError: Speech recognition error occurred. Please try again.
initializationError: Failed to initialize speech recognition. Please ensure your browser supports this feature and grants necessary permissions.
microphoneNotFound: No microphone device found. Please check your device connection.
languageNotSupported: Current language is not supported, switched to alternative language.
apiKeyReminder: To use the AI assistant, please configure your DeepSeek API Key in settings
modelSelectionDescription: Choose the AI model to use
deepseekChatDescription: General-purpose model for daily conversations and common tasks
deepseekReasonerDescription: Advanced model with reasoning capabilities for complex problems
emptyTodoHint: No todos yet. Add some to get started!
autoThemeDescription: Automatically switch theme based on system settings

searchLocaleDesc: Language and region settings for search

getApiKeyVisitConsole: Get API Key: Visit DeepSeek Console
secureConfigureApiKey: Securely configure your DeepSeek API key
confirmClearAllConversations: Are you sure you want to clear all conversation records? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteConversation: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
settingsDescription: Manage your application configuration and preferences
searchLocaleDesc: Select the language to use for searching
searchTimeoutDesc: Set the timeout for search requests
uncertaintyDetectionDesc: Detect expressions like "I'm not sure", "maybe", "as far as I know" and automatically supplement search
noTriggerSearchDesc: Creative requests (writing, programming), calculation problems, personal privacy related
testInputPlaceholder: Enter question to test keyword recognition...

autoAnalyzeNewTodosDesc: Automatically perform AI analysis when adding new todos
enablePriorityAnalysisDesc: Use AI to analyze the priority level of todos
enableTimeEstimationDesc: Use AI to estimate the completion time of todos
aiAnalysisConfigurationDescription: Configure the behavior of AI smart analysis features
enterEstimatedTime: Enter estimated time (e.g., 30 minutes, 2 hours, 1 day)
invalidTimeFormat: Invalid time format, please use format like: 30 minutes, 2 hours, 1 day
systemPromptsDescription: Manage AI assistant system prompts to customize AI behavior and response style
enableSystemPromptsDesc: Use custom system prompts instead of default prompts
activeSystemPromptDesc: Select the system prompt to use
deletePromptMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the system prompt '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
createFirstPrompt: Create your first custom system prompt
promptContentPlaceholder: Enter system prompt content, this will define the AI assistant's behavior and response style...
promptContentHelp: System prompts tell the AI how to respond to your questions, such as: role setting, response style, professional domain, etc.
enhancePromptContent: Use AI to intelligently optimize prompt content
promptTagsHelp: Tags can help you better organize and find system prompts
